title: SpellForce.2.Faith.in.Destiny.Digital.Deluxe.Edition-PROPHET
description:
Spellforce 2 - Faith in Destiny *Digital Deluxe Edition*    
                         (c) Nordic Games                        
                                                                  
         release date ...: September 2766                         
         protection .....: Steam                                  
         # of discs .....: 1                                      
         languages ......: EN/FR/DE/IT/ES                         
         ---------------------------------------------------      
                                                                  
         In times of war and chaos you will assume the  role      
         of a young man, who is  supposed  to  liberate  the      
         entire world of Eo from  the  new,  nameless  evil.      
         Along with a group of diverse heroes and  a  dragon      
         as trustful companions,  you  will  fight  to  gain      
         information about this  mysterious  new  enemy  and      
         thereby discover your own true destiny. With daring      
         and courage you will be able  to  succeed  in  this      
         brand  new,  epic,   strategic   RTS/PRG-Mix   that      
         combines   the   storylines   of    the    previous      
         Spellforce-games and continues further.                  
                                                                  
         The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:                     
                                                                  
         * Faith in Destiny Soundtrack                            
         * WorldMap in digital form                               
         * Artworks Booklet in digital form                       
                                                                  
         We have also included all released DLCs:                 
                                                                  
         * Scenario 1: Flink's Secret Diary                       
         * Scenario 2: The Golden Fool                            
         * Scenario 3: The Last Stand                             
                                                                 
   
                                                 
                                                            
         1- Unpack, burn or mount                                 
         2- Install the game                                     
         3- Copy the crack from PROPHET dir                       
         4- Go To Hell!                                           
                                                                  
         NOTE:                                                    
         Game version is  v2.28.2124  (latest  from  steam).      
         This release is multilanguage, but  DLCs  are  only      
         available in english and german languages.
